message.name: ERR_CONTRACTPERFORMANCEMEASURE_XRV_MEASURE_NOT_APPLICABLE_FOR_SPECIFIED_OUTPUT
message.locale: The target value must be, %1c, for the performance measure, %2c.

message.name: ERR_CONTRACTPERFORMANCEMEASURE_XRV_CONTRACT_IN_INVALID_STATE_TO_ADD_PERFORMANCE_MESURE
message.locale: The contract is %1s, the performance measure cannot be added.

message.name: ERR_CONTRACTPERFORMANCEMEASURE_XRV_CONTRACT_IN_INVALID_STATE_TO_UPDATE_PERFORMANCE_MESURE
message.locale: The contract is %1s, the performance measure cannot be amended.

message.name: ERR_CONTRACTPERFORMANCEMEASURE_XRV_CONTRACT_IN_INVALID_STATE_TO_REMOVE_PERFORMANCE_MESURE
message.locale: The contract is %1s, the performance measure cannot be removed.

message.name: ERR_CONTRACTPERFORMANCEMEASURE_XRV__PERFORMANCE_MESURE_NOT_APPLICABLE_PROVIDER
message.locale: Performance Measures %1s is not applicable for the provider.

message.name: ERR_CONTRACTPERFORMANCEMEASURE_XRV__PERFORMANCE_MESURE_NOT_APPLICABLE_ALL_SERVICES
message.locale: Performance Measures %1s is not applicable for all contract services.

message.name: ERR_CONTRACTPERFORMANCEMEASURE_XRV__PERFORMANCE_MESURE_APPLICABLE_TO_SINGLE_SERVICES
message.locale: Performance Measures '%1s' is applicable to a single service, it cannot be added at the contract level.

message.name: ERR_CONTRACTPERFORMANCEMEASURE_XRV__PERFORMANCE_MESURE_NOT_APPLICABLE_TO_SERVICES
message.locale: Performance Measures %1s is not applicable for services.
